PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-10272024-09-20FIN, GAC
ActCustoms Tariff
SubjectChina Surtax Order (2024)
PrecisCHINA SURTAX ORDER (2024) in order to impose a surtax of 100 per cent on electric and hybrid vehicles produced in China and imported into Canada, effective October 1, 2024.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0187 Publication Date: 2024-10-09
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: CHINA SURTAX ORDER (2024) in order to impose a surtax of 100 per cent on electric and hybrid vehicles produced in China and imported into Canada, effective October 1, 2024.
